title: TOWIE's Sam Mucklow and Shelby Tribble get engaged as co-stars congratulate pair
text:

TOWIE's Sam Mucklow and his love Shelby Tribble have got engaged.

The Only Way Is Essex hunk Sam asked his legion of admirers and TOWIE friends who was going to be coming to the wedding.

Alongside the cheeky comment, the TOWIE star posted a picture where he planted a kiss on Shelby's lips.

He wrote: "Who’s coming to the wedding then?"

And of course all of their TOWIE co-stars piled in to congratulate them.

Tommy Mallett was the first to congratulate the couple on taking their romance to the next level. He wrote: "Congratulations bro."

Chloe Meadows made it clear she was interested in being a wedding guest with her response. She offered: "Me!!!!!!!"

(Image: Instagram)

Liam Gatsby chimed in: "Of course she was gonna say Yes!!!!!! Congrats you two."

Shelby has yet to break her silence on the engagement.

The Mirror have approached Shelby Tribble's representatives for further comment.

(Image: Instagram)

It rings true that one wedding follows another as their co-star Olivia Attwood has just got engaged to her footballer boyfriend Bradley Dack.

However, it seems to have been on the cards for awhile for Sam and Shelby.

Sam has hinted he could see a future with Shelby as he said he was ready to "wind down", live with her and have kids.

He told Metro: “I’m 27 now, Shelby’s 27 and I want to wind down and calm down. I want to live with her.

“I want to have kids soon and I see that with Shelby. She’ll be such a good mum. She’s great with my nephews, you should see her with them.

"We've spent the whole summer together in Spain, she’s been with my family and my sisters and everyone just loves her."

(Image: Instagram)

Shelby echoed her love's sentiments when she freely expressed her interest in starting a family and getting married to Sam.

She said: "For me personally we think about having babies, marriage. He’s got so many qualities that I love in a man and I know that he will make a great partner and dad because of how he is with me. "



The couples relationship has taken a complete U-turn after scenes were aired on TOWIE showing the pair embroiled in a furious row in Thailand.

Their spat led to the former promotional model throwing a drink at the hunk.

In retaliation the livid star called his now fiancée “a slag”.

However, in months that followed, the couple found themselves back in each other's arms.
description: TOWIE stars congratulated their friends on getting engaged when Sam asked who wanted to come to their wedding
